casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Whaley, Appellant.
Submitted January 10, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.
Allan I. Steinberg and Neil Carver, for appellant.
Albert L. Becker and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 16, 1973:
